field.name: main_display
field.label: Main Layout
field.description: Choose how to use the Module

field.name: show_products_in
field.label: Show Products in
field.description: You can show products in different ways, all of them are mobile compatible

field.name: main_button_additional_info
field.label: This button opens the dropdown
field.description: It's main functionality is to show the mini cart dropdown, it accepts different dynamic properties - see bellow options

field.name: main_only_button_additional_info
field.label: This button is the only visible
field.description: This button is commonly used as a link to Checkout or Cart, it can also show dynamic content from the Cart - see bellow options

field.name: iconbuttondef
field.label: Icon with a Badge
field.description: This will show an Icon type button, with no background or border, together with a badge with cart total inside, if any, if it's 0, it will not be visible until first item added

field.name: main_button_icon_badge_background_color
field.label: Badge Background Color
field.description: It's highly nrecommended to use a colorful badge, chose wiselly based on it's background

field.name: main_button_icon_badge_text_color
field.label: Badge Text Color
field.description: Color inside the badge, should do a nice contrast with the background

field.name: main_button_custom_style_text
field.label: Text and Icon Color
field.description: Color of inner Text (if any) and Icon

field.name: main_button_is_link
field.label: Button is a Link
field.description: The main button can be a menu item link, commonly used for Checkoout or Cart menu

field.name: main_button_link
field.label: Button Action
field.description: What should this button do, when pressend

field.name: iconbuttontextsuggestion
field.label: Text with an Icon Button
field.description: The Icon type button already show the amount of items in the cart, within a badge, you may want to adjust this text accordingly, if any. This layout is a very good looking layout, self intuititive, by default it does not require additional text, we left this option just in case you want to improve it with some custom content. If you changed the icon, the best working one is cart, just choose it from the dropdown and you are good to go ;)

field.name: main_button_text
field.label: Text in Button
field.description: Accepts dynamic variables: [cartTotal] [cartItemsCount] - This field has a default value, in order to NOT show a text, just put an empty space.

field.name: main_button_icon
field.label: Icon in Button
field.description: Icon visible inside the button, or without a button, if Button Icon is selected, together with text if any is set

field.name: main_button_custom_icon
field.label: Button custom icon
field.description: Can use any icon from UIkit 3

field.name: main_button_icon_side
field.label: Icon Side
field.description: Where to position the icon relative to the text

field.name: products_layout
field.label: Products Layout
field.description: Choose from different Layouts for Producst, this layouts can be overriden, or you can create new ones

field.name: items_image_width
field.label: Image Width
field.description: Set image pixel width (only the number), the height will be automatically calculated

field.name: empty_cart
field.label: Empty Cart Message
field.defualt: THERE ARE NO ITEMS IN YOUR CART
field.hint: THERE ARE NO ITEMS IN YOUR CART

field.name: alert_product_removed
field.label: Alert on Product Removal
field.description: Show a confirmation alert before the product is removed from the cart

field.name: buttons_products_list
field.label: Cart Button
field.description: You can show up to 2 links at the end of the products list, usually for Cart and/or Checkout

field.name: main_button1_link
field.label: Button Action
field.description: Select a menu item for the Button Link

field.name: main_button1_custom_style_text
field.label: Text Color
field.description: Color of inner Text and Icon

field.name: main_button1_icon
field.label: Icon in Button
field.description: Icon visible inside the button

field.name: main_button1_custom_icon
field.label: Button custom icon
field.description: Can use any icon from UIkit 3

field.name: main_button1_icon_side
field.label: Icon Side
field.description: Where to position the icon relative to the text

field.name: main_button2_link
field.label: Button Action
field.description: Select a menu item for the Button Link

field.name: main_button2_custom_style_text
field.label: Text Color
field.description: Color of inner Text and Icon

field.name: main_button2_icon
field.label: Icon in Button
field.description: Icon visible inside the button

field.name: main_button2_custom_icon
field.label: Button custom icon
field.description: Can use any icon from UIkit 3

field.name: main_button2_icon_side
field.label: Icon Side
field.description: Where to position the icon relative to the text

field.name: dropdown_heading
field.label: Heading text
field.description: This text will be displayed above the cart items

field.name: dropdown_heading_style
field.label: Style
field.description: Heading style that can be added to the heading, independently from the HTML element

field.name: dropdown_pos
field.label: Position
field.description: Position relative to the trigger element

field.name: dropdown_offset
field.label: Offset
field.description: Offsets the dropdown from the trigger button, based on the position param, the value are pixels, without px

field.name: dropdown_spacing
field.label: Spacing
field.description: Spacing for the Dropdown container

field.name: dropdown_close
field.label: Close Behaviour
field.description: Options that enable different behaviour for closing the Cart Dropdown

field.name: drop_card_close_button
field.label: Close Button
field.description: Top right corner X button to close the dropdown

field.name: drop_card_close_on_outclik
field.label: Outside of the Dropdown
field.description: Close the dropdown if clicked at any other part of the page

field.name: drop_card_close_on_samebutton
field.label: Same button that opens it
field.description: Same button that opens the dropdown can close it

field.name: dropdown_close_alert
field.label: The Dropdown will not Close
field.description: If all options are negative, there will be nothing to close the dropdown, unless the user go to a different page. Just be aware... :)

field.name: offcanvas_overlay
field.label: Overlay
field.description: To add an overlay, blanking out the rest of the page. If overlay is disabled the user can still use the rest of the page and scroll trough it

field.name: offcanvas_close_bg
field.label: Close on Background
field.description: If user click on the background or overlay, it will close the Offcanvas

field.name: offcanvas_close_esc
field.label: Close when Esc pressed
field.description: If Esc is pressed on the keyboard, the Offcanvas will be closed

field.name: offcanvas_heading
field.label: Heading text
field.description: This text will be displayed above the cart items

field.name: offcanvas_heading_style
field.label: Style
field.description: Heading style that can be added to the heading, independently from the HTML element

field.name: modal_close_bg
field.label: Close on Background
field.description: If user click on the background or overlay, it will close the Offcanvas

field.name: modal_close_esc
field.label: Close when Esc pressed
field.description: If Esc is pressed on the keyboard, the Offcanvas will be closed

field.name: modal_heading
field.label: Heading text
field.description: This text will be displayed above the cart items

field.name: modal_heading_style
field.label: Style
field.description: Heading style that can be added to the heading, independently from the HTML element
